articles.content:
Polish Preparatory Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung Inaugurated 
   Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Polish Preparatory Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Warsaw on June 26.
 Addressing an inaugural ceremony, Tadeusz Bialkowski, first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, said that the world people recollect with deep reverence the great life of Kim Il Sung who had devoted everything to the happiness of the people.    
 The preparatory committee decided to organize a seminar, film show, book and photo exhibition and introduce his greatness and undying exploits in various forms and ways on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: DPRK's Self-Defensive Steps Favored
articles.content:
Fidel Castro Ruz Receives DPRK Government Delegation 
   Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, met and had a friendly conservation with the DPRK government delegation headed by Jon Sung Hun, vice-premier of the Cabinet, on a visit to Cuba at the building of the Council of State on June 29.
 He said that the Cuban people are always with the Korean people, adding that Cuba will positively support and encourage the Korean people in their struggle for justice, truth and independence.

Committee to Remember Kim Il Sung Inaugurated by Koreans in Russia
   Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia inaugurated the Committee to Remember President Kim Il Sung on June 26.
 Ju Hui Chol, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The committee set a period for remembering Kim Il Sung from June 26 to July 8 and decided to hold diverse events including a meeting to remember him, listening to the tape on which Reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung "With the Century" is recorded, a lecture and a film show.
